text: today I'm gonna share with you something
that's a little bit less of a recipe and
more of like one of my favorite things
to eat so I just wanted to share it with
you it's cheese and marmalade toast
you're gonna love it and it's a great
breakfast to boot slice up some
delicious whole-grain bread it is a
little bit healthier this way and the
flavor is so good have your broiler
preheating and just get these guys
toasting you can actually do this in
your toaster too if you wanted to I
really love toast I think the toast is
one of the most perfect foods but to
make it even more perfect add some
really really sharp cheddar cheese
that's what I'm adding here this is a an
extra sharp cheese go as sharp as you
like and then some orange marmalade you
could also use raspberry jam that's one
of my favorite combinations but the
bitter sweetness of the orange marmalade
mixed with the sharpness of the extra
sharp cheddar is kind of fantastic but
not everybody loves a bitter marmalade
as much as I do so experiment with your
sweet and savory flavors and let me know
what your favorite combinations are back
into the broiler until everything is
bubbling and the cheese is melted and
you'll have my favorite breakfast that's
my all-time favorite recipe well it may
not be a recipe but it is one of my
all-time favorite things to eat I hope
you give it a try and let me know what
your all-time favorite thing to eat is
boom eat it wild-type
[Music]
